metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3355 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in the Linux kernel'sdrivers/gpu/drm/msm/msm_gem_submit.c code in the submit_lookup_cmdsfunction, which fails because it lacks a check of the return value ofkmalloc(). This issue allows a local user to crash the system.

criterions.comment: linux-aws package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
